text: :question: anyone use Skrollr,js recently? just wondering if it tends to flop in newer browsers
no, but I found this last week and I'm itching for a use-case lol: <https://github.com/drewjbartlett/vue-flickity>

looks like ScrollMagic seems to be the most popular alternative. The warning on the Skrollr repo throws up red flags for me
yea that was my concern with it, the library however can do something I need and was built to support old browsers(something I also need)
basically I just need a library that can do parallax with text inside the parallax region
